SCM_CIPHER_MODE_MASK - Bit definitions


Defines

#define SCM_DECRYPT_MODE   0x1
#define SCM_ENCRYPT_MODE   0x0

Define Documentation

#define SCM_DECRYPT_MODE   0x1

decrypt from black to red memory

#define SCM_ENCRYPT_MODE   0x0

encrypt from red to black memory
